message.body: How was firefly?
It was mostly great! The Avett Brothers were amazing. My camping neighbors were awesome! Fun times :) how was your weekend?
It was great. I did a whole bunch of relaxing nothing and not much else.
ou. Sounds nice
I'm really good at doing Nothing when I should be doing dishes or clean
ing the bathroom. Other than that I'm really bad at doing Nothing haha. Good for y
That's good that you were mostly great.
We should do a thing together. Longwood gardens is nice. Mercer museum is interesting. Food is always good. Lots of things exist.
Man there are so many things! And I love doing them! Haha you don't hav
I'm trying to take advantage of
e any week days available do you? I've got a few days off this week and next that
I could get out of here at 11a on thursday, or Saturday is good for me. Which of the many things tickles your fancy?
Hmmm you ever been to grounds for sculpture? I've never been, and it's a
lot closer than longwood gardens. Well at least to me. Where are you again? Philly?
I've been to grounds for sculpture once. It was a fun time. Let's go there on Saturday. (I'm near the Philly airport)
Ok. I can probably make Saturday work, but Thursday is a little better for me if it still works for you?
what's your address?
enter keep right and go through the stone pillars. Follow that around and you'll
pa The entrance has a small yellow enter sign. It's immediately after the golf co
urse. Don't pass it! Turning around is a bitch if you miss it. When you
see an area where cars are parked. Then call me and I'll come out and getcha
I'm on snipes farm and education center 890 west bridge st morrisville
Sounds simple!
I bet if I were a helicopter engineer I could figure out how to get the goddamn bag onto the vacuum cleaner!!! Arg... Ha
